summary: I know Harry, Ron, and Hermione have the nickname “The Golden Trio”, but let’s be honest here, the REAL golden trio of Harry...
body: I know Harry, Ron, and Hermione have the nickname “The Golden Trio”, but let’s be honest here, the REAL golden trio of Harry Potter was Hagrid, and Mr. and Mrs. Weasley. They were the adults who truly put Harry first, caring for him and having his best interests at heart

reblog.comment: I know Harry, Ron, and Hermione have the nickname “The Golden Trio”, but let’s be honest here, the REAL golden trio of Harry Potter was Hagrid, and Mr. and Mrs. Weasley. They were the adults who truly put Harry first, caring for him and having his best interests at heart

summary: Price To Pay (George Weasley X Fem!Reader)
title: Price To Pay (George Weasley X Fem!Reader)
body:
Characters: George Weasley X Fem!Reader

Universe: Harry Potter

Warnings: Character death, mourning, spoilers. 

SAD ANGST

Request: George weasley x reader where they’re fighting in the battle of Hogwarts and the reader gets hit with the killing curse and George doesn’t know she’s dead until after he knows about Fred and there’s just a lot of angst and George reveals that he was gonna propose soon

They’d won. They’d done it. Voldemort was dead, and his army had been defeated. They’d won.

George was relieved it was all over. Relieved he could go home with Fred and his family, and of course Y/N, his girlfriend. God- he couldn’t wait to see you!

As he made his way around the ruins of the battlefield, he saw many faces, and many were familiar. People hugged, chatted, reunited- it only made him more excited. But after a while of searching, he found more familiar faces… Harry, Hermione, and they were leaving a crowd. When they saw George, instead of smiling, being happy… they looked so torn up. And seeing Fred just made it worse… something’s happened.

He quickly pushed through the crowd, seeing several familiar red heads of his family, until he was in the centre, and he saw him. His brother. His twin. Fred. He was just laid there… dead. He knew exactly how it had happened, but he was still asking himself how. Could he had stopped it if he was there?

He couldn’t feel anything more than sadness at that moment. Just seeing his best friend since being born, and knowing he wasn’t going to wake up. He didn’t try to hide his emotions, he couldn’t. Not even if he tried. He felt his mother’s hand on his shoulder as she tried to reassure him, while also being a mess herself. No one could blame her, she’d just lost her baby boy, so she wanted to cling onto the one whose face resembled him almost identically, being afraid he’d fade as well.

Seeing Fred dead made him think. Made him realise that not everyone had made it out alive. Not everyone was as lucky as him. How many were dead? How many people that he cared about were dead? He looked around, naming each face that he knew, finally being able to see the rest of his family, and some friends… but one was missing. His heart dropped.

“W-Where’s Y/N? Where is she?” He asked, looking around desperately. His family looked around for you. You and George had been together since your first year in Hogwarts, and you were one of the few who could tell Fred and George apart. You were as much trouble as the twins, but when you and George were together, everyone could see a more mature side to George. You were practically family to the Weasley’s by the time Harry, Hermione and Ron had started their first year. The younger Weasley’s you as an older sister, and the older as a younger sister, and George’s mother and father were very quick to take you in as family. Why weren’t you here? Had you seen him and walked away to be alone, thinking it was him? Or to just mourn? He stood up, looking over the several dozen heads for you. “Y/N?” He called.

He forced himself away from his family and brother, desperate to find you. He needed to find you. He ran through the ruins once again, looking left right and centre for any sign of you. He went down one of the corridors, calling your name. He’d last seen you down there, and he hoped that you’d maybe gotten lost, or got a little injured so had hidden the rest of the fight.

Then he turned the corner, and there you were.

He froze. He couldn’t move. You were there, alone. Alone, and on the floor. Not moving. “No…no…” He shook his head, finally forcing his legs to move closer to you. As he came closer, he saw that you had no injury. No sign of it being from a blast, or bleeding out, or anything else. It became abundantly clear what you had died from. The Killing Curse. “No-no-no-no…. please no… Y/N.” He sobbed, his legs going weak beneath him as he collapsed beside your body.

Your face was almost peaceful, though your eyes showed no light and didn’t blink. Your face resembled that of you daydreaming back in a class years ago. Back when you were alive. You were on your back, which told George you’d seen the face of your killer before they took your life. You had seen it coming for a split second before you were murdered. While with Fred he only held his hand, he couldn’t help himself from picking you up and pulling you tightly into his chest, just cradling you. His wailing made the footsteps of his family approaching silent to his ears, and told them what he’d found at the end of the hallways. His siblings all remained behind at the end, all sobbing at the sight. His mother had to force herself to swallow and hold back tears as she approached her son, kneeling beside him and putting an arm around him. He looked up, letting her see your face. Beside a few small marks, you were untouched, telling her how you perished.

“It’s okay George… she died quickly, she didn’t have pain… It’s alright.” She tried to assure, even though it tore her up as well.

“I could have saved her… I should have been here- I could have protected her- sacrificed myself-“

“Don’t you dare say that George! That would mean she would be alone. She wouldn’t have wanted that.” She tried to assure him more, as he continued to sob, holding tightly onto you.

“I was gonna marry her, mum. I was gonna marry her. I-I had a ring and everything- I was gonna propose to her after all of this was over. I’d see her, and I’d just hold her so tightly, and just ask her. We were gonna get married, have kids and grow old…” He admitted, loud enough for not only her, but for those at the end of the hallways. It wasn’t just his family anymore. It was Hermione, Harry, and so many others who had followed after them. No one approached, knowing who was speaking, who he was talking about, and it didn’t fail to make everyone’s heart ache for him. “IT’S NOT FAIR!”

“I know son, I know…” Molly’s voice sobbed, just holding her son and letting him mourn. He’d not only lost his twin brother, his best friend. He’s also lost a girl who in no doubt was the closest anyone could get to a soulmate.

Hope you like it! I actually started crying while writing this. If you have any questions, please send them in! 

*Not my gif 

TAGS: @courtneychicken  @graysonmalfoy @bellero @captain-peanut-at-your-service @likiyoshi-lijie  @sebstanchrisevanchickforever19 @marveloussupernatural @aesthetjic @originalpottervengerlock @supernatural-pan @esoltis280 @lena-stan-xavier @lady-of-lies

SAD ANGST

They’d won. They’d done it. Voldemort was dead, and his army had been defeated. They’d won.

George was relieved it was all over. Relieved he could go home with Fred and his family, and of course Y/N, his girlfriend. God- he couldn’t wait to see you!

Seeing Fred dead made him think. Made him realise that not everyone had made it out alive. Not everyone was as lucky as him. How many were dead? How many people that he cared about were dead? He looked around, naming each face that he knew, finally being able to see the rest of his family, and some friends… but one was missing. His heart dropped.

You and George had been together since your first year in Hogwarts, and you were one of the few who could tell Fred and George apart. You were as much trouble as the twins, but when you and George were together, everyone could see a more mature side to George. You were practically family to the Weasley’s by the time Harry, Hermione and Ron had started their first year. The younger Weasley’s you as an older sister, and the older as a younger sister, and George’s mother and father were very quick to take you in as family. Why weren’t you here? Had you seen him and walked away to be alone, thinking it was him? Or to just mourn? He stood up, looking over the several dozen heads for you. “Y/N?” He called.

He forced himself away from his family and brother, desperate to find you. He needed to find you. He ran through the ruins once again, looking left right and centre for any sign of you. He went down one of the corridors, calling your name. He’d last seen you down there, and he hoped that you’d maybe gotten lost, or got a little injured so had hidden the rest of the fight.

Then he turned the corner, and there you were.

He froze. He couldn’t move. You were there, alone. Alone, and on the floor. Not moving. “No…no…” He shook his head, finally forcing his legs to move closer to you. As he came closer, he saw that you had no injury. No sign of it being from a blast, or bleeding out, or anything else. It became abundantly clear what you had died from. Your face was almost peaceful, though your eyes showed no light and didn’t blink. Your face resembled that of you daydreaming back in a class years ago. Back when you were alive. While with Fred he only held his hand, he couldn’t help himself from picking you up and pulling you tightly into his chest, just cradling you. His wailing made the footsteps of his family approaching silent to his ears, and told them what he’d found at the end of the hallways. His mother had to force herself to swallow and hold back tears as she approached her son, kneeling beside him and putting an arm around him. He looked up, letting her see your face. “It’s okay George… she died quickly, she didn’t have pain… It’s alright.” She tried to assure, even though it tore her up as well.

“Don’t you dare say that George! That would mean she would be alone. She wouldn’t have wanted that.” She tried to assure him more, as he continued to sob, holding tightly onto you.

“I was gonna marry her, mum. I was gonna marry her. I-I had a ring and everything- I was gonna propose to her after all of this was over. blog.name: ao3feed-wolfstar
blog.title: remus x sirius ao3 feed
blog.description: (I don't actually read all these fics or choose what comes on the blog, it's literally just a feed of the ao3 ship tag sorry)

summary: When Harry Potter Failed His Test
title: When Harry Potter Failed His Test
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Mk7c6J

by GreyWolfandMoon

Raising Harry ONE SHOT: Harry has to let his godparents sign his test, only he doesn’t know which of them would let him off more easily. SBRL.

Words: 2266, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences

FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

blog.name: peujeune
blog.title: The Morríghan
blog.description: Laura | Australia | Bisexual Aromantic | Maker of Tiny Human | If you’re an American, a TERF, a Larrie, an Anti-Snaper or a Pro-Marauder please feel free to fucking eat me | I write shitty Fanfictions sometimes (X/X) |

summary:
I don't know why I still read Snape hate when I know it makes me so angry but here we are.
Point is, my parents separated when I...
body:
I don’t know why I still read Snape hate when I know it makes me so angry but here we are.

Point is, my parents separated when I was really young. My mum was a drunk and my dad was abusive. My mum had some real shitty boyfriends, including a drug addict who almost murdered me on multiple occasions. My dad had some real shitty girlfriends, including a woman who locked me in a shed over night.

And you know what? I took it out on other people who didn’t deserve it. I was a shitty fucking person. I was violent and I hurt people. I put a kid in hospital cause he broke my finger (trying to pull me out of a tree and hurt me worse, but still), and I gave a girl a black eye (she pushed me in front of traffic, but still, not okay).

I can apologise and try to make up for the things I’ve done, and it’s another’s choice to forgive me. I have no pull in what they decide.

Snape did what he could to make up for things he’d done. He spied for the Order, he gave Harry the information he needed to defeat Voldemort. Whether or not you think Harry was right in forgiving him doesn’t matter. It was Harry’s choice.

If he was real, if Harry Potter was a real flesh and blood person standing in front of you, telling you he’s forgiven a man who did awful things to him, a man you haven’t yourself forgiven, you can’t change his mind.

You can try as hard as you’d like, but it’s like I always say: you can take a horse to water, but you can’t make it drink.

It took awhile, but I forgave the girl who pushed me in front of a car. I forgave the boy who broke my finger, and he forgave me for breaking his rib. I even forgave my parents. My sister has yet to forgive our dad, but that’s her choice. I can’t make her do anything.

You may hate Snape, you may even hate the fans who forgave Snape for what he’s done, but you can’t stop us.

And look, on another note, I haven’t forgiven Albus Dumbledore for what he did to win the war. He left a child in an abusive home, he manipulated said child. He never allowed him a childhood, he constantly put him in danger. But guess what? That doesn’t matter one shit to Harry Potter, does it? The idiot still forgave him for the danger he was put in from such a young age. You all forgave him for the danger he put Harry in; ’for the greater good’, but I haven’t. You can’t change my mind and I can’t change yours.

I’m sorry for the long post, but I’d really like everyone to understand this. I’m going to bed now, so you can all argue with each other if you’d like.

blog.name: rachelundefined
blog.title: RachelUndefined
blog.description:
Who am I? Can anyone really answer that question? I don't know who I am. I'm undefined.

What am I into? My biggest, but by no means only, passion is HP fanfics. My interests are many and varied, and my posts reflect my diversity.

Will our interests correspond? Only you can answer that question. Or will you, like myself, remain undefined?
